definition: to spread/to display/to set up/(old) holder for door-knocker
plank bed/place to sleep/shop/store/(old) relay station

sentences.english: A straw mat did duty for a bed.
Please make your beds after breakfast.
sentences.chinese: 早饭后请把你们的床铺整理好。

sentences.english: A crude bed was covered by thick straws.
sentences.chinese: 一张简陋的大竹床铺着厚厚的稻草。

sentences.english: Is it for bowing his head like a rush And for spreading out sackcloth and ashes as his bed?
sentences.chinese: 岂是叫人垂头像苇子，用麻布和炉灰当床铺么？

sentences.english: Haywire pulls the sketchbook out from under the bunk and begins flipping through the pages.
sentences.chinese: Haywire从床铺下拿出了并翻阅一套素描本。

sentences.english: After getting up, I picked at the sheet, fluffed up the pillow and made the bed.
sentences.chinese: 起床后，我拉平床单，拍松枕头，把床铺好。

sentences.english: You can purchase single sheets so that you can mix and match your bedding .
sentences.chinese: 你可以购买单票，使你能搭配你床铺。

sentences.english: There is a personal bed for every employee.
sentences.chinese: 每个员工都有自己的床铺。

sentences.english: In the bedroom she sat on the unmade bed and sipped the drink.
sentences.chinese: 进了卧室，她坐在未整理的床铺上，喝着酒。

sentences.english: Maids and Butlers will now make the Murphy Bed and Heart Bed if they are messy.
sentences.chinese: 女佣和管家会整理折叠床和心形床的床铺。

sentences.english: Your most comfortable bed is in the other person's house.
sentences.chinese: 你的最舒适的床铺是在别人的房子里的。

sentences.english: How about a single room with an extra bed?
sentences.chinese: 一个单人房，再加一个床铺怎么样？

sentences.english: The wife eased her husband by tidying up his bed.
sentences.chinese: 妻子给她丈夫整理床铺，使他舒服些。
我们还可以加活动床铺。

sentences.english: We shook down a straw mattress as an improvised bed.
sentences.chinese: 我们在地上摊开一条草垫作为临时床铺。

sentences.english: Another good tip is to lie down in your bunk as sleeping lowers your levels of histamines.
sentences.chinese: 也可以躺在床铺上，因为睡眠可以降低组胺水平。

definition: sofa (loanword)/CL:條|条[tiao2],張|张[zhang1]/(Internet slang) the first reply or replier to a forum post
